title: Tuna, Arugula And Feta Sandwich And Salad
summary: Need a pescatarian main course? Tuna, Arugulan And Feta Sandwich And Salad could be an awesome recipe to try. One serving contains 507 calories, 36g of protein, and 26g of fat. This recipe serves 4 and costs $3.28 per serving. 53 people have made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 2 minutes. A mixture of arugula, whole-grain bread, olive oil, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 100%. This score is great. Try Tuna, Arugulan and Feta Sandwich and Salad, Veggie Fetan and Arugula Pita Sandwich with Tzatziki Sauce, and Watermelon Arugulan And Feta Salad for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Tuna works really well with Merlot, Pinot Noir, and rosé Wine. Though fish is often paired with white wine, 'meatier' fish like tuna can absolutely go with red wine. A Rosé will also pair nicely, particularly if your tunan is prepared with ingredients better suited to a white wine. The Tinga Rio Reserve Merlot with a 4.8 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 12 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Tinga Rio Reserve Merlot
productMatches.description: Ruby red in color with notes of raspberries and strawberries on the nose. Sweet spices came through on the palate from the French and American oak and the palate finishes with soft round tannins. Certified Sustainable and Certified Vegan.

instructions: Combine oil and vinegar. Mix tuna in a bowl with 4 tsp dressing, feta and olives. Layer 1 cup arugula, 2 slices of the tomato and tuna mixture on each of 4 slices of bread. In a bowl, toss 12 cups arugula with remaining tomatoes and dressing. Serve with sandwich.Combine oil and vinegar. Mix tuna in a bowl with 4 tsp dressing, feta and olives. Layer 1 cup arugula, 2 slices of the tomato and tuna mixture on each of 4 slices of bread. In a bowl, toss 12 cups arugula with remaining tomatoes and dressing. Serve with sandwich.
